name: Bomb Me
description:
Join the 10 million people that have already played the epic trajectory shooter, Bomb Me! Find your enemy, aim your weapon and take your shot! Collect pets, get epic armor, and prepare to battle in your Bomb Me Kingdom adventure!

- A perfect port of the adorable atmosphere and casual shooting gameplay.

-Dominate PvP against real players in real-time.

-Track your PvP progress in the DDTank Hall of Fame.

-Feed and train pets, foster their love and take them with you into battle!

-Collect more than 301 outfits to style up your characters!

-Online and offline access lets you play anywhere, anytime.

-Find true love with the innovative marriage system.

-Arm yourself with Darts, Lasers, Plungers and dozens of other cute weapons.

-Explore mysterious fortresses, travel to distant worlds, and challenge powerful dragons!

Adorable combat and thrilling gameplay, what are you waiting for? Join the magical world of Bomb Me now!
